title: Textile, ca. 1705
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: compound weave of damassé foundation (8 harness satin plus plain weave) with floats of alternate foundation wefts and discontinuous supplementary wefts bound 3/1 twill \ by a supplementary warp
description: Fantastic leafy forms and entwining plants form a motif in metallic edge with light green plants one above the other and side by side for a continuous pattern. The background is dark red and damassé, the pattern of which forms a narrow shadow-edge to the motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1705.Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: compound weave of damassé foundation (8 harness satin plus plain weave) with floats of alternate foundation wefts and discontinuous supplementary wefts bound 3/1 twill \ by a supplementary warp. 1972-53-2-a,b.
